title: Six Salsa Dance Classes for £12 with Flip andBounce (Up to £48 Value)
highlights:
• UKA-accredited instruction
  • Suitable for all levels and abilities
  • Great way to stay in shape and meet new people
  • Valid at three locations: Footloose Dance Studio (DE21 7SS); The Riverside Club Hollis Lane (S41 7RE); The Irish Association (DE1 1HT)

title: 18Hole Round of Golf For Two With Lunch for £39 at Branston Golf and Country Club(Up to £100.30 Value)
highlights:
• Set around the river Trent
  • Par 72 challenging course
  • 30 driving balls each
  • Pie of the day
  • Meals available daily from 7am

title: Romantic Stay For Two with Rose Petal Bubble Bath, Strawberries and Bubbly for £85 at the Lace Market Hotel (up to £216 Value)
highlights:
• Glass of bubbly each in Saint cocktail bar
  • Chocolate dipped strawberries in room
  • Rose petal bubble bath
  • English breakfast
  • Room upgrade available for supplementary fee
